meanings.definition: To express excessive emotion or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: She overemotes when she sees cute puppies.
meanings.sent2: He always overemotes when his favorite team wins a game.
meanings.sent3: The actor overemotes in every scene, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her face overemotes joy, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The child overemotes excitement, jumping up and down.

meanings.definition: Excessive display of emotion or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: His overemotes can be overwhelming for others.
meanings.sent2: The singer's overemotes captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show was full of overemotes, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The painting's colors were an overemotes of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The party was an overemotes of joy and celebration.
